sentences.sContent: There was a great demand for engravings of his portrait, and his head was being modelled by an admiring sculptor.
sentences.sContent_eng: There was a great demand for engravings of his portrait, and his head was being modelled by an admiring sculptor.
sentences.sCn: 人们强烈要求要帮他做一个雕塑，一位有名的雕刻家正在把他的头像做成模型。

sentences.sContent: We can take the mysterious， hazy future and carve out of it anything that we can imagine， just like a sculptor carves a statue from a shapeless stone.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can take the mysterious， hazy future and carve out of it anything that we can imagine， just like a sculptor carves a statue from a shapeless stone.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以掌握神秘而不可知的未来，从中创出我们所能想象的任何东西，一如雕刻家可以将未成型的石头刻出雕像一样。

sentences.sContent: This is what the sculptor must do.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is what the sculptor must do.
sentences.sCn: 而雕塑家就必须做到这一点。

words.tran: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）
